relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: ssh If you’re connecting to another computer over the Internet, you’ll probably want to keep your data safe. SSH is one way to help do that. To make it happen, you’ll need to set up SSH properly on your computer, and then create an encrypted(加密) connection to your server. Just remember, in order for the connection to be secure, both ends of the connection need to have SSH enabled. Follow this guide to make sure that your connection is as safe as possible.
